meanings.definition: People who use something incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: The misusers of the equipment caused it to break.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned the students about being misusers of school property.
meanings.sent3: The misusers of the office printer accidentally printed hundreds of blank pages.
meanings.sent4: The misusers of the internet turned a helpful tool into a source of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The misusers of the library books left them torn and scribbled on.

meanings.definition: The act of using something incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: The misusers of the software led to system crashes.
meanings.sent2: The misusers of the information shared it without permission.
meanings.sent3: The misusers of the microwave set it for too long and burnt their popcorn.
meanings.sent4: The misusers of the parking lot caused chaos with their reckless driving.
meanings.sent5: The misusers of the tools left them scattered and damaged in the workshop.
